subject: Tennis
French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Simona Halep, who beat Svetlana Kuznetsova, and Andrea Petkovic, who beat Sara Errani, will meet Thursday, with the winner reaching her first Grand Slam final.
snippet: Simona Halep, who beat Svetlana Kuznetsova, and Andrea Petkovic, who beat Sara Errani, will meet Thursday, with the winner reaching her first Grand Slam final.
